content.content: It states over and over that this is soft tied to the usd and is meant as a stable coin. It was exactly that until Jan. 2021. There has been a lot of talk about USD inflation. Is this surge in MKR tied to inflation or the fear of inflation? Or is there some community reason for the increase? Thinking about getting some but seems expensive comparativelyVidMate
content.GPT-summary: The post is a question about the surge in MKR and whether it is tied to inflation or if there is a community reason for the increase. The author also expresses interest in purchasing MKR but is hesitant due to its high price compared to other options.

content.content: The market sets the price of MKR, and it is DAI that is pegged to the USD. Hope that helps!

Is there an incentive for holding MKR? Governance       The basic idea is that MKR appreciates over time, because the profits of the protocol, beside paying salaries and infrastructure costs, are used to buy MKR in the market (i.e., provide buy pressure) and then burn MKR (i.e., reduce the total supply).  So the idea is that you want to HODL MKR just like you want to hold growth-stocks (without dividends) such as Amazon, etc.     That’s the best answer as to why MKR is going up.
